title: [RIDGELINE] Things Become Other Things — Available Now!
content:
Walkers, have I got a walking book for you:
Things Become Other Things.
It’s a book about walking thousands of kilometers of the Kii Peninsula. About walking those old Kumano Kodō paths — but not the ones you probably know. It’s about talking with a thousand fishermen and farmers and kissa owners, about communing with the mountain fauna, about hopscotching around leeches. It’s about floods and tsunamis and the capricious fecundity of nature.
